_header: A sorry beverage it is and sore it is a-bought
_description: Christ’s Prayer in Gethsemane — two monorhyming quatrains

NLS18721.First Lines:
A sory beuerech it is & sore it is a bouthNou in þis sarpe
                    time þis brewing hat me brouth…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…Suete fader i am þi sone þi wil be fulfilthI am he
                    þin owen child I wil don as þu wilth
